units.name: Trooper
units.description: Standard infantry unit armed with basic weaponry and light armor. Several variants.

units.name: Commissar
units.description: Elite Trooper variant that boosts the morale of nearby allies and coordinates attacks.

units.name: Scout Strider
units.description: Fast and nimble reconnaissance unit, capable of detecting enemy positions and weak spots. Several variants.

units.name: Berserker
units.description: Frenzied melee unit that charges at enemies with reckless abandon. Often found in groups.

units.name: Devastator
units.description: Heavy weapons specialist armed with devastating firepower, capable of suppressing enemy positions. Several variants

units.name: Gunship
units.description: Similar in design to the Dropship, the Gunship is an aerial scout machine that can detect and neutralize Helldivers. Usually found in a group of two or three.

units.name: Hulk
units.description: Massive and heavily-armored enemy, capable of dealing and absorbing tremendous amounts of damage. Several variants.

units.name: Tank
units.description: Armored vehicle equipped with powerful weaponry, posing a significant threat on the battlefield. Several variants.

units.name: Factory Strider
units.description: Mobile Factory that can deploy Devastators in the field. Has several destructive weaponry on its sleeve, posing great threat.

units.name: Dropship
units.description: Aerial transport unit used for deploying reinforcements.

description.text: Carburant Lorem ipsum dolor, sit amet consectetur adipisicing elit. Alias atque delectus sit quo, quae laudantium est non ducimus earum, excepturi optio praesentium recusandae eligendi quidem fuga obcaecati voluptates, aliquam possimus.

units.name: Scavenger
units.description: Agile and scavenging Terminid, often found in packs.

units.name: Pouncer
units.description: A juvenile version of the Hunter, weak but jumps up close from vast distance.

units.name: Bile Spitter
units.description: A juvenile version of the Bile Spewer, spits bile that slows down Helldivers and explodes upon death.

units.name: Warrior
units.description: Terminid warrior capable of devastating close-quarters combat and quick movement. Several Variants.

units.name: Hive Guard
units.description: A medium sized Terminid with thick frontal armor-can often be found guarding Bug holes.

units.name: Hunter
units.description: Stealthy and agile Terminid, specialized in ambush tactics.

units.name: Brood Commander
units.description: Leadership-class Terminid capable of coordinating attacks and deploying reinforcements.

units.name: Stalker
units.description: Ambush Terminid specialized in hit-and-run tactics. Able to camouflage within its surroundings and deal tremendous burst damage, will retreat when injured.

units.name: Shrieker
units.description: Flying Terminids specialized in swarm tactics, will hover around Helldivers and swoop in to attack, not difficult to dodge individually.

units.name: Bile Spewer
units.description: Terminid with medium armor, capable of spewing corrosive bile over a wide area. They can also rain down volleys of bile akin to a mortar.

units.name: Nursing Spewer
units.description: Terminid with light armor, capable of spewing corrosive bile over a wide area.

units.name: Charger
units.description: Fast-moving, heavily armored Terminid specialized in charging attacks. Several variants.

units.name: Impaler
units.description: Terminid with heavy armor that uses bladed tentacles to significantly disrupt retreats.

units.name: Bile Titan
units.description: Massive Terminid with a potent bile attack and heavy armor.

description.text: Squids Lorem Lorem ipsum dolor sit, amet consectetur adipisicing elit. Dicta quos doloremque corporis quia, porro nostrum temporibus corrupti aperiam sapiente, eius optio alias similique neque sequi deleniti ipsum mollitia magnam quod?

units.name: Voteless
units.description: Once the citizens of Super Earth, they were transformed into mind-controlled zombies by the Illuminate. Often found in hordes.

units.name: Overseer
units.description: Illuminate infantry units specialized in melee and ranged attacks with its staff. Can deploy a shield for protection.

units.name: Elevetad Overseer
units.description: Overseers equipped with a jet pack for mobility. Able to fire consecutive shots from its gun.

units.name: Harvester
units.description: Large tripod-like mech armed with a force field. Can vaporize its enemies with laser beam or stun targets with electric bolt.

units.name: Watcher
units.description: Surveillance drone that can call forth reinforcements.

units.name: Warp Ship
units.description: Disc-shaped shuttle that deploy Illuminate troops.
